text:
e="preserve">Bill Dubuque is an American screenwriter. He is known for co-creating the Netflix crime drama series "Ozark" (2017–present). His movie credits include "The Judge" (2014), "A Family Man" (2016) and "The Accountant" (2016). In 2017, he scripted an upcoming DC Extended Universe Nightwing movie.
Dubuque was born in St. Louis, Missouri. He is married and has three children.
